revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Seafloor Cavern |image = [[File:Seafloor Cavern.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Seafloor Cavern. |tokens = 32,000 |location = To the west of Route 128. }} '''Seafloor Cavern''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Hoenn]]. It initially has 49 tiles arranged in a 7x7 square, including 7 chest tiles, 17 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 530,000 HP.
== Encounter Tables ==
===Wild Encounters===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | [[File:Zubat.png|40px]] Zubat || [[File:Team_Aqua_Grunt_(male).png|40px]] Team Aqua Grunt || [[File:Poochyena.png|40px]] Poochyena |- | [[File:Golbat.png|40px]] Golbat || [[File:Team_Aqua_Grunt_(male).png|40px]] Team Aqua Grunt || [[File:Carvanha.png|40px]] Carvanha |- | [[File:Tentacool.png|40px]] Tentacool || [[File:Team_Aqua_Grunt_(male).png|40px]] Team Aqua Grunt || [[File:Zubat.png|40px]] Zubat |- | [[File:Magikarp.png|40px]] Magikarp || [[File:Team_Aqua_Grunt_(female).png|40px]] Team Aqua Grunt || [[File:Carvanha.png|40px]] Carvanha |- | rowspan=2|[[File:Wailmer.png|40px]] Wailmer || [[File:Team_Aqua_Grunt_(male).png|40px]] Team Aqua Grunt || [[File:Mightyena.png|40px]] Mightyena, [[File:Golbat.png|40px]] Golbat |- | [[File:Aqua_Admin_(shelly).png|40px]] Aqua Admin Shelly || [[File:Sharpedo.png|40px]] Sharpedo,[[File:Mightyena.png|40px]] Mightyena |- |}
